meta.job_title: Senior Accountant-Fixed Asset & Capital Project Accounting

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform transactional and control processes for the Capitalized Assets and ongoing Capital Projects Portfolio.
Conduct the monthly accounting close processes and financial analysis for various domestic and foreign subsidiaries.
Assist with due diligence of fixed asset records related to new acquisitions.
Partner with Capital Project managers to ensure continuous evaluation of capital vs expense and month-end accruals.
Prepare audit schedules and resolve audit issues as identified by internal and/or external auditors.
Assist in developing, documenting, and implementing department processes and SOX controls.
Partner with the G/L Accounting Group and Field Operations to conduct annual fixed asset existence testing.
Prepare and provide recommendations on opportunities to improve processes and changes to company policies and procedures.
Adhering to the Code of Business ethics is essential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting; CPA strongly preferred
